attributes.action: introduce serious penalties for serious water pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the tragic pollution of the River Trent, which has wiped out much of its wildlife, it is time the Prime Minister introduced serious penalties for these incidents. In a recent case, Severn Trent, with turnover of £1.55 billion and profits of £470 million was fined £6,700 for a sewage pollution. This is not a deterrent penalty to polluters but an acceptable cost
